basics.name: Chris Heninger
basics.label: Front-end Developer
basics.summary: Results driven individual with significant and proven experience.  Designed, developed, and deployed several websites and web applications.  Excellent technical, analytical, and problem solving skills. Graduated with a Bachelor of Science in Computer Information Systems.

work.summary: Ribyt is a dynamic, cloud-based event and guest management platform. I worked with a team of three back-end developers and one designer to create the application from the ground up.
experience: Developed an Angular application based on collaborated mocks with a UI designer.
Designed/developed a media library component that allows users to upload and crop a new image, or select from existing images.
Utilized the ngResource and ui-router modules to communicate with a back-end RESTful API and manage data throughout the application.
Learned the intricacies of the Angular framework and improved page performance by utilizing best practices across the platform.

work.summary: Jobing.com is a web-based job search engine. Recruiting.com assists companies in creating job listings, career sites, and managing candidate relationships.
experience: Developed a new login/signup module to ensure secure authentication for job seekers on the Jobing.com platform.
Designed/developed an interactive, dynamic reporting application for hiring managers on the Recruiting.com platform.
Improved site load speed significantly by debugging, refactoring, and utilizing best practices in an existing Classic ASP codebase.

work.summary: Qualtrics is a cloud-based enterprise survey platform helping customers gather valuable market insights.
experience: Designed/developed a new marketing homepage, product pages, and thousands of subpages.
Consolidated multiple websites from over the years into an organized, single WordPress installation, running on the AWS stack to ensure redundancy.
Worked with the marketing team to improve lead generation across the website through simple A/B testing.

work.summary: iGravity Design provides one-on-one website design and development services for small to medium-sized businesses in the Phoenix metropolitan area. I started this company in June 2010.
experience: Designed/developed unique websites, logos, business cards, and other marketing materials.
Configured a Virtual Private Server to run WHM and cPanel to manage over 40 unique websites.
Established company in 2010, including registering an LLC, developing a brand-identity, and building a clientele.
